summary: Completed backend and frontend testing for La Pulper√≠a app. All 22 backend API tests passed. Frontend landing page loads correctly with animations. Protected routes (jobs-services, admin) correctly redirect to login when not authenticated. Ad Assignment Log public page works correctly.

minor.issue: ESLint warnings for missing fetchData dependency in AdminPanel.js and PulperiaDashboard.js - not critical but should be addressed

issues: Design looks good with red theme and animations working correctly
Page loads correctly with proper styling

action_items: Fix ESLint warnings for useEffect dependencies in AdminPanel.js and PulperiaDashboard.js (add fetchData to dependency array or use useCallback)
critical_code_review_comments: Banner URL fix is properly implemented using model_dump(exclude_unset=False)
AnimatedBackground component correctly supports red and blue color variants
AdminPanel has gaming-style badges properly defined (Starter, Rising Star, On Fire, Elite, Champion, Legendary, Verified, Partner)
JobsServices page uses blue theme correctly with AnimatedBackground color='blue'
Protected routes correctly redirect to landing page when not authenticated
seed_data_creation: No seed data created - used existing data
context_for_next_testing_agent: All public API endpoints tested and working. Protected routes require Google OAuth authentication. Admin panel requires admin email (onol4sco05@gmail.com). JobsServices page is at /jobs-services route. Blue theme for jobs page is implemented via AnimatedBackground component with color='blue' prop.
